translation.en: - LET'S SEE. THE BREAD MOLD.
- BREAD MOLD.
- FURRY. - FURRY.
- MUSHY. - MUSHY.
- NEXT, THE FISH MOLD.
- FISH MOLD.
- STINKY.
- I AM SO UPSET!
YOU WON'T BELIEVE WHO I GOT PARTNERED WITH FOR THE BIG SHOWCASE.
translation.de: Weißt du, mit wem ich auftreten soll?

translation.en: - ANDREW HARRIS,
A TENTH GRADER.
- WHAT'S THE BIG SHOWCASE?
- IT'S A PERFORMANCE THEY PUT ON AT HER SCHOOL EVERY YEAR WHERE-- - THEY INVITE AGENTS
translation.de: Ihre Schule macht das jedes Jahr...

translation.en: AND DIRECTORS AND PRODUCERS AND OTHER SUPER-POWERFUL PEOPLE IN SHOW BUSINESS
translation.de: Da kommen Agenten, Regisseure und andere wichtige Leute.

translation.en: AND IT'S EXTREMELY IMPORTANT TO ME WHICH IS WHY I AM VERY UPSET AND GOOD-BYE.
translation.de: Das ist mega wichtig, deshalb bin ich sauer. Und tschüss!

translation.en: - HEY! HE AND I HAVE A SCIENCE PROJECT DUE TOMORROW.
translation.de: Hey. Unser Projekt ist morgen fällig.

translation.en: I HAVE TO TURN IN MY MOLD BUSH.
- NO-- ANDREW IS COMING OVER AND YOU GOTTA HELP US
translation.de: Nein. Andrew kommt gleich und du musst helfen.

translation.en: FIGURE OUT WHAT WE'RE GONNA DO IN THE BIG SHOWCASE. I DEFINITELY WANNA SING.
translation.de: Was sollen wir machen? Ich will singen.

translation.en: HOW WAS THAT? - LOUD?
- AWESOME! [DOORBELL RINGS]
- UGH, HE'S HERE.
STAY.
COME IN. - THANKS.
- TORI, THAT'S ANDREW.
- ANDRE. - HEY.
- YOU GO TO HOLLYWOOD ARTS, TOO?
- OH, NO, I'M NOT A PERFORMER. JUST MY SISTER.
translation.de: Ich trete nicht auf. Nur meine Schwester.

translation.en: - YEP. I GOT THE TALENT,
translation.de: Ich trete nicht auf. Nur meine Schwester. Jup. Ich hab Talent, und sie hat gute Zähne.

translation.en: AND SHE GOT THE STRONG TEETH.
translation.de: Jup. Ich hab Talent, und sie hat gute Zähne.

translation.en: YOU KNOW, SHE'S NEVER HAD ONE CAVITY?
- I TRY NOT TO BRAG ABOUT IT.
- OH, NICE PIANO.
- OH, MY GOD, YOU'RE FANTASTIC.
- HE'S OKAY.
- FISH MOLD.
- NO, GRANDMA, LISTEN,
translation.de: 5 TAGE ÜBEN MIT TRINA UND ANDRÉ TRINA MACHT MICH WAHNSINNIG! Oma, du kannst an meiner Schule nicht ertrinken.

translation.en: THERE'S NO WAY YOU CAN DROWN AT MY SCHOOL.
translation.de: Oma, du kannst an meiner Schule nicht ertrinken.

translation.en: LOOK, I GOTTA-- I GOTTA-- I'LL CALL YOU LATER!
translation.de: Ich leg jetzt auf - bis dann.

translation.en: - YOUR GRANDMOTHER'S COMING TO THE BIG SHOWCASE?
- YEAH, IT'S GONNA BE THE FIRST TIME SHE'S LEFT THE HOUSE IN SIX YEARS. - WHY?
translation.de: Sie war seit sechs Jahren nicht draußen.

translation.en: - 'CAUSE THE WOMAN'S AFRAID OF EVERYTHING: PEOPLE,
UMBRELLAS, RABBIS, BIKINIS, BREAKFAST FOODS...
- SO IF SHE SAW A RABBI IN A BIKINI EATING PANCAKES...
translation.de: Ein Rabbi im Bikini beim Frühstück...

translation.en: - THE WOMAN WOULD BURST INTO FLAMES.
(Trina) - YOU GUYS, COME ON!
- BACK TO REHEARSAL. - LET'S GO.
- SO? WHAT DO YOU THINK?
FABULOUS, RIGHT?
- YOU REALLY NEED TO WEAR THAT, JUST TO REHEARSE?
translation.de: Willst du das zur Probe tragen?

translation.en: - A PERFORMER NEEDS TO FEEL THE PART TO BE THE PART.
translation.de: Ein Darsteller muss seine Rolle leben.

translation.en: - I THOUGHT WE TALKED ABOUT YOU NOT TAPPING MY NOSE ANYMORE.
- OKAY, WE GOT THE COMEDY STUFF DOWN, SO LET'S START WITH MY SONG.
translation.de: Der Comedy-Teil steht, jetzt zu meinem Song.

translation.en: - AND BY "YOUR SONG" I'M GUESSIN' YOU MEAN THAT SONG I WROTE?
translation.de: Also der, den ich geschrieben habe?

translation.en: - NO ONE CARES WHO WROTE THE SONG.
NOW-- TAKE IT FROM "WHEN I MAKE IT SHINE."
[OFF-KEY] ♪ WHEN I MAKE IT SHINE ♪
WELL? - DO YOU HAVE ANY ASPIRIN?
- OH, HI. YOU'RE ANDRE'S GRANDMOTHER? - I DON'T KNOW YOU!
- EXCUSE ME, YOU'RE TRINA'S PARENTS?
- YES. - WHY?
- PLEASE COME WITH ME.
[MUMBLES] - MAH TONG!
- THERE SHE IS.
- TRINA! - WHAT HAPPENED?
[MUMBLES] - UN THINS ONG ITH AH UNG.
- OH MY GOD, IT'S HUGE!
[MUMBLES] - UMBAH-EE OO THUMPTHIN. - DOES ANYBODY KNOW HOW THIS HAPPENED?
- THE CHINESE HERB GARGLE. - [MUMBLES] ETH! ETH! - WAIT, WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
- SHE FOUND SOME WEBSITE THAT SHOWS YOU HOW TO MAKE A SPECIAL CHINESE HERB GARGLE THAT'S SUPPOSED TO HELP YOU SING BETTER.
translation.de: Sie hat im Internet eine Kräuterlösung bestellt, um besser zu singen.

translation.en: - WELL, SHE MUST HAVE HAD AN ALLERGIC REACTION TO IT.
[MUMBLES] - AH OUTH EELS OOOGE!
- WILL SHE BE OKAY?
- WELL, HER TONGUE IS OBVIOUSLY ENGORGED AND--
OH, IT'S THROBBING ERRATICALLY.
- THROBBING ERRATICALLY?
- [MUMBLES] IH ITHZ OBBIN AWADDAKWEE!
- ANY WAY SHE'LL BE ABLE TO PERFORM TODAY? - OF COURSE NOT.
- ETH AH AN! I THWEA DA OD AH AN!
- STOP TALKING! YOUR TONGUE COULD BURST!
- I'M SORRY, SWEETIE. - NEXT YEAR.
- I'M GONNA TAKE HER OVER THERE AND MASSAGE HER TONGUE.
translation.de: Ich werde ihr hier die Zunge massieren.

translation.en: [MUMBLES] - MASSAGE MA TONG?
- I GUESS MY GRANDMA CAME HERE FOR NOTHIN'.
translation.de: Meine Oma ist also umsonst hier.

translation.en: - WAIT-- DOES ANYONE ELSE KNOW TRINA'S PART?
- HER SISTER DOES. - ME SISTER?
NO, NO, NO, NO, I JUST HELPED THEM REHEARSE. I'M NOT EVEN A STUDENT HERE. I COULDN'T GO ONSTAGE--
translation.de: Ich habe nur geholfen. Ich bin keine Schülerin hier.

translation.en: - YOU KNOW THIS WHOLE THING INSIDE AND OUT-- THE SONG,
translation.de: Du kannst das auswendig. Song, Choreographie... Du kannst alles.

translation.en: THE CHOREOGRAPHY-- YOU CAN DO THIS, COME ON.
- UH-UH. - SHE SAID SHE'LL DO IT.
- NO. NO, I DID NOT SAY I WOULD DO IT.
- WHOA, WHOA, SHE CAN'T GO ON STAGE WEARING THAT.
- EXCUSE ME.
- GO GET HER SOMETHING COOL TO WEAR.
- I AM NOT GOING, OKAY? - BRING HER.
- NO-- WAIT! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
- HEY, HEY, HEY, HEY, HEY.
WHAT, WHAT, WHERE ARE YOU GOING?
translation.de: Hey! Was? Wo willst du hin? Lass los. Ok, alles wird gut.

translation.en: LIKE, STOP. LET GO, OKAY. IT'S OKAY, IT'S ALL RIGHT.
translation.de: Lass los. Ok, alles wird gut.

translation.en: SHUT UP AND-- PLEASE DON'T MAKE ME--
- LET GO OF ME. WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
translation.de: Lasst mich. Was soll das? Ich mache das nicht. Nein.

translation.en: NO, NO, NO, NO.
I SAID LET GO OF ME, PLEASE. NO, NO, PLEASE.
♪ HERE I AM, ONCE AGAIN ♪
♪ FEELIN' LOST ♪ ♪ BUT NOW AND THEN ♪
translation.de: ♪ Und fühle mich verloren Aber hin und wieder ♪

translation.en: ♪ I BREATHE IT IN ♪ ♪ TO LET IT GO ♪
translation.de: ♪ Atme ich durch und lasse los ♪

translation.en: ♪ AND YOU DON'T KNOW ♪ ♪ WHERE YOU ARE NOW ♪
translation.de: ♪ Und du weißt nicht, wo du bist ♪

translation.en: ♪ OR WHAT IT WILL COME TO ♪ ♪ IF ONLY SOMEBODY COULD HEAR ♪
translation.de: ♪ Oder was passieren würde Wenn dich jemand hört ♪

translation.en: ♪ WHEN YOU FIGURE OUT HOW ♪
♪ YOU'RE LOST IN THE MOMENT ♪ ♪ YOU DISAPPEAR... ♪
translation.de: ♪ Lebst du den Moment, du verschwindest ♪

translation.en: ♪ YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE AFRAID TO PUT YOUR DREAM IN ACTION ♪
translation.de: ♪ Hab keine Angst, deinen Traum zu leben ♪

translation.en: ♪ YOU'RE NEVER GONNA FADE ♪ ♪ YOU'LL BE THE MAIN ATTRACTION ♪
translation.de: ♪ Du wirst nie untergehen Es wird nur um dich gehen ♪

translation.en: ♪ NOT A FANTASY ♪ ♪ JUST REMEMBER ME ♪ ♪ WHEN IT TURNS OUT RIGHT ♪
translation.de: ♪ Das ist keine Fantasie. Denk an mich, wenn alles gut wird. ♪

translation.en: ♪ 'CAUSE YOU KNOW THAT IF YOU LIVE IN YOUR IMAGINATION ♪
♪ TOMORROW YOU'LL BE EVERYBODY'S FASCINATION ♪
♪ IN MY VICTORY ♪ ♪ JUST REMEMBER ME ♪ ♪ WHEN I MAKE IT SHINE ♪
translation.de: ♪ Wenn ich gewinne, denk an mich, wenn ich leuchte ♪

translation.en: ♪ YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE AFRAID TO PUT YOUR DREAM IN ACTION ♪
translation.de: ♪ Hab keine Angst, deinen Traum zu leben ♪

translation.en: ♪ YOU'RE NEVER GONNA FADE ♪ ♪ YOU'LL BE THE MAIN ATTRACTION ♪
translation.de: ♪ Du wirst nie untergehen Es wird nur um dich gehen ♪

translation.en: ♪ NOT A FANTASY ♪ ♪ JUST REMEMBER ME ♪ ♪ WHEN IT TURNS OUT RIGHT ♪
translation.de: ♪ Das ist keine Fantasie. Denk an mich, wenn alles gut wird. ♪

translation.en: ♪ 'CAUSE YOU KNOW THAT IF YOU LIVE IN YOUR IMAGINATION ♪
♪ TOMORROW YOU'LL BE EVERYBODY'S FASCINATION ♪
♪ IN MY VICTORY ♪ ♪ JUST REMEMBER ME ♪
translation.de: ♪ Wenn ich gewinne, denk an mich ♪

translation.en: ♪ WHEN I MAKE IT SHINE ♪
- OH, MY GOD, SWEETIE! - THAT WAS INCREDIBLE!
- EXCUSE ME.
WHO ARE YOU?
- I'M TORI VEGA. WHO ARE YOU?
translation.de: Ich bin Tori Vega. Und Sie?

translation.en: - THIS IS MR. EICHNER, OUR PRINCIPAL.
- YOU DON'T GO TO SCHOOL HERE? - NO, I JUST--
translation.de: -Gehst du nicht hier zur Schule? -Nein, ich...

translation.en: - DO YOU WANT TO?
- ME? - MM-HMM.
- WELL, SHOULD I?
- YES!
- BUT THE KIDS WHO GO HERE ARE ALL LIKE CRAZY TALENTED.
translation.de: Aber alle hier sind so talentiert.

translation.en: - YEAH, SO ARE YOU.
- BUT WHAT IF I'M NOT GOOD ENOUGH?
- HEY.
- HEY!
- HEY, ANDRE!
- THIS GIRL DOESN'T KNOW IF SHE'S GOOD ENOUGH TO GO TO SCHOOL HERE.
translation.de: Ist sie gut genug für diese Schule?

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU PEOPLE THINK?
OKAY?
- OKAY!
- SEE? IT'S JUST A HIGH SCHOOL.
- UH, THIS IS NOT JUST A HIGH SCHOOL.
THESE KIDS ARE ALL ARTSY AND CREATIVE AND TALENTED,
translation.de: Alle sind so kreativ und talentiert und ich bin...

translation.en: AND I'M JUST... NORMAL.
translation.de: Alle sind so kreativ und talentiert und ich bin... ...normal.

translation.en: - IT'S OKAY, THERE'S NOTHING WRONG WITH BEING AVERAGE.
translation.de: Schon gut. Durchschnitt ist auch ok.

translation.en: ANYWAY, YOU'RE NOT ALONE.
translation.de: Und du bist ja nicht allein. Ich bin bei dir.

translation.en: I GOT YOUR BACK. - OKAY. SO--
translation.de: Und du bist ja nicht allein. Ich bin bei dir. -Ok... -Trina!

translation.en: - TRINA! ERIC PAULSON GOT HIS HAIR STRAIGHTENED! - SHUT UP! OH, MY GOD--
- I'M ALONE.
- HEY, UM, CAN YOU TELL ME-- - OH, MY GOD, YOU'RE TORI, RIGHT?
translation.de: -Hey, kannst du mir... -Oh, Gott, du bist Tori, oder?

translation.en: - UH-HUH. - YOU WERE SO AWESOME IN THE BIG SHOWCASE.
- AW, THANKS.
- MY NAME'S CAT. - LIKE THE ANIMAL?
- WHAT'S THAT SUPPOSED TO MEAN?
- NOTHING, I, I LOVE CATS. - ME TOO, THEY'RE SO CUTE.
translation.de: -Nichts, ich mag Katzen. -Ich auch, echt süß.

translation.en: - HEY, UM-- - OH, HI.
HEY. HELLO.
FEMALE? YES.
- CAN YOU TELL ME WHERE MR. SIKOWITZ' CLASSROOM IS?
- DOWN THE HALL, SWING A LEFT AT THE WATER FOUNTAIN,
translation.de: Den Flur runter, am Trinkbrunnen links,

translation.en: SECOND DOOR ON YOUR RIGHT.
- THANK YOU.
- WHATEVER IT TAKES, CUPCAKE.
- OH, MY GOSH. - AH, IT'S COOL--
translation.de: -Oh, hey. -Oh, mein Gott. -Ah, schon gut. -Nein, hier...

translation.en: - NO, HERE-- I THINK IT'S COMING OUT.
translation.de: -Ah, schon gut. -Nein, hier... -Das geht raus. -Du machst es schlimmer.

translation.en: - YOU MIGHT BE MAKING IT WORSE, ACTUALLY.
- DUDE, WHY YOU RUBBING MY BOYFRIEND?
- I JUST-- I SPILLED COFFEE ON-- - GET AWAY FROM HIM.
- RELAX.
- OH, MY GOD, THERE'S A HUGE FIRE!
KIDDING, KIDDING.
JUST WANTED TO GET YOUR BLOOD PUMPING, WHICH I DID-- HA!
translation.de: Wollte euch nur in Fahrt bringen. Das hat geklappt. Ha!

translation.en: ALL RIGHT! NOW, LET'S GET STARTED--
translation.de: Alles klar! Dann legen wir mal los...

translation.en: RUMPS IN CHAIRS.
- HE'S OUR TEACHER?
- OKAY, FIRST, I'D LIKE TO INTRODUCE OUR NEW STUDENT, TORI.
translation.de: Zuerst will ich unsere neue Schülerin Tori vorstellen.

translation.en: AND I'D LIKE TO THANK TORI FOR HER GENEROUS GIFT OF $2
translation.de: Und ihr für die zwei Dollar danken,

translation.en: WHICH SHE HANDED ME OUTSIDE THIS MORNING. NOT NECESSARY, BUT MUCH APPRECIATED.
translation.de: die sie mir heute Morgen gab. Nicht nötig, aber nett.

translation.en: - WHY'D YOU GIVE HIM $2? - I THOUGHT HE WAS HOMELESS.
translation.de: -Warum das Geld? -Ich hielt ihn für obdachlos.

translation.en: - NOW, TODAY WE'RE GOING TO CONTINUE OUR STUDY IN GROUP IMPROV.
translation.de: Heute werden wir mit der Gruppenimpro weitermachen.

translation.en: TORI, I ASSUME YOU'RE FAMILIAR WITH IMPROV?
- NO. - OKAY, CRASH COURSE.
translation.de: -Weißt du, was das ist? -Nein. Ok, Schnellkurs Impro.

translation.en: IMPROV-- ACTING WITHOUT A SCRIPT,
translation.de: Ok, Schnellkurs Impro. Schauspielern ohne Skript.

translation.en: WHICH MEANS THE ACTORS MUST MAKE UP
translation.de: Die Schauspieler erfinden also die Handlung und den Text,

translation.en: THEIR OWN ACTIONS AND DIALOGUE AS THEY PERFORM THE SCENE.
translation.de: Die Schauspieler erfinden also die Handlung und den Text, während sie spielen. Klar?

translation.en: UNDERSTOOD? EXCELLENT!
translation.de: während sie spielen. Klar? Großartig. Jade, du führst die erste Gruppe.

translation.en: JADE, YOU WILL CAPTAIN THE FIRST GROUP OF THE DAY.
translation.de: Großartig. Jade, du führst die erste Gruppe.

translation.en: CHOOSE YOUR ACTORS.
- CAT, ELI, BECK... AND TORI.
- OKAY, LET'S GIVE 'EM A PLACE.
- HOME. - HOME.
- OOH, REAL CREATIVE.
- YOU BE QUIET.
- AND NOW WE NEED A SITUATION. - BIG NEWS.
- ANDRE, NOBODY WANTS TO SEE BIG NUDES.
- NEWS.
- AH, WELL, THAT'S DIFFERENT. BIG NEWS.
translation.de: Ah, das ändert alles. Große Neuigkeiten.

translation.en: - UH, WHY DON'T YOU GO WAIT IN THE HALL?
- UH, OKAY.
- OKAY, AT HOME, BIG NEWS--
AND ACTION.
- HEY, BABE, HOW WAS WORK TODAY?
- AH, I GOT FIRED. - OH.
- AGAIN? - IT'S OKAY.
translation.de: -Ah. -Schon wieder? Schon gut. Ich habe große Neuigkeiten, die euch freuen werden.

translation.en: I HAVE GREAT NEWS THAT'LL CHEER UP THIS WHOLE FAMILY.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich habe große Neuigkeiten, die euch freuen werden.

translation.en: - WHAT IS IT? - TELL US!
- I WENT TO THE ANIMAL SHELTER
AND GOT US... A DOG.
- UH, YEP.
I'M THE NEW FAMILY DOG.
WOOF.
- SIKOWITZ, WILL YOU PLEASE TELL THIS AMATEUR THAT DOGS CAN'T TALK,
translation.de: Sikowitz, sagen Sie dieser Amateurin, dass Hunde nicht sprechen,

translation.en: AND THAT THEY DON'T WALK ON TWO LEGS?
translation.de: und nicht auf zwei Beinen stehen?

translation.en: SIKOWITZ!
- OH, I'M SORRY, I WAS SUCKING THE MILK OUT OF THIS COCONUT.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich muss Kokosmilch trinken.

translation.en: BUT IT'S TRUE, TORI, IF YOU'RE GOING TO PLAY A DOG,
translation.de: Aber Tori, echt, wenn du einen Hund spielst,

translation.en: BE A DOG.
- WOOF. - AND ACTION.
- UH, I WENT TO THE ANIMAL SHELTER AND GOT US A DOG.
translation.de: Ich war im Tierheim und jetzt haben wir einen Hund.

translation.en: - WOW! - AWESOME!
- UH-OH, LOOKS LIKE THIS DOG HAS BUGS IN HER FUR.
translation.de: Oh, nein, der Hund hat Wanzen im Fell.

translation.en: - UH, WOOF?
- EWW! - GROSS!
- OH, IT'S OKAY. I READ ON THE INTERNET THAT COFFEE WORKS GREAT
translation.de: Passt schon. Ich habe im Internet gelesen, dass Kaffee toll

translation.en: FOR GETTING RID OF FUR BUGS.
translation.de: Passt schon. Ich habe im Internet gelesen, dass Kaffee toll gegen Wanzen im Fell ist.

translation.en: - MAYBE YOU SHOULDN'T, UM-- - JADE.
translation.de: gegen Wanzen im Fell ist. -Du solltest nicht... -Jade!

translation.en: - WHAT'S THE PROB, DOG?
- HEY, WHATCHA DOIN'?
- CALLING MY MOM TO TELL HER I WANNA GO BACK TO MY OLD SCHOOL. - WHY?
translation.de: Ich will an meine alte Schule.

translation.en: - 'CAUSE I DON'T LIKE HAVING BLACK COFFEE IN MY HAIR.
- THEN I'LL GET YOU SOME CREAM AND SUGAR. EVERYTHING WILL BE CHILL.
translation.de: Dann mit Milch und Zucker? Alles wird gut.

translation.en: - HEY, MOM, I NEED YOU TO-- - MM-MM, NO.
- GIMME BACK MY MOM!
- YOU'RE GONNA QUIT THIS SCHOOL ON YOUR FIRST DAY, JUST BECAUSE OF ONE MEAN GIRL?
translation.de: Willst du am ersten Tag aufgeben? Nur wegen einer Zicke?

translation.en: - IT'S NOT JUST HER!
translation.de: Es ist nicht nur sie. Ich passe nicht...

translation.en: IT'S JUST-- I DON'T FIT IN HERE WITH-- ALL THIS.
translation.de: Es ist nicht nur sie. Ich passe nicht... ...hierher! Diese Schule ist gar nicht so anders.

translation.en: - C'MON, THIS PLACE ISN'T THAT DIFFERENT
translation.de: Diese Schule ist gar nicht so anders.

translation.en: FROM OTHER SCHOOLS.
translation.de: Diese Schule ist gar nicht so anders. Wo sonst unterrichtet ein barfüßiger Lehrer Impro,

translation.en: - OH, YEAH, LIKE REGULAR SCHOOLS HAVE IMPROV CLASSES
translation.de: Wo sonst unterrichtet ein barfüßiger Lehrer Impro,

translation.en: WITH BAREFOOT TEACHERS AND NERDS WITH PUPPETS
translation.de: Wo sonst unterrichtet ein barfüßiger Lehrer Impro, sprechen Nerds mit Puppen und behandeln dich Zicken wie ein Tier?

translation.en: AND BIPOLAR CATS AND MEAN GIRLS WHO MAKE YOU BARK LIKE A DOG?
translation.de: sprechen Nerds mit Puppen und behandeln dich Zicken wie ein Tier?

translation.en: - SIKOWITZ WANTS YOU BOTH BACK IN CLASS.
- HE ASKED ME TO TELL THEM!
- SEE, THIS DOESN'T HAPPEN AT MY OLD SCHOOL.
translation.de: Das gibt es an meiner alten Schule nicht.

translation.en: - WILL YOU GUYS BE COOL?
- HIM? BE COOL? [LAUGHING EVILLY]
- YOU'RE A DEMON!
- YOU GUYS, SIKOWITZ REALLY WANTS EVERYBODY BACK IN CLASS.
translation.de: Leute, Sikowitz will euch wieder im Unterricht.

translation.en: - AND YOU REALLY WANTED A DATE TO THE PROM LAST YEAR,
translation.de: Du wolltest ein Date zum Abschlussball,

translation.en: BUT YOU DIDN'T GET ONE, DID YA?
- REX! - TELL YOUR PUPPET TO QUIT BEING MEAN TO ME!
- DON'T CALL HIM A PUPPET!
THAT'S AN OFFENSIVE TERM!
- YEAH, THIS SCHOOL'S PRETTY NORMAL.
- JUST PLEASE GO BACK TO CLASS AND TELL SIKOWITZ WE'LL BE THERE IN A MINUTE?
translation.de: Bitte sagt Sikowitz, dass wir gleich kommen.

translation.en: - YOU BETTER HURRY. - YEAH.
- I WAS GONNA SAY YEAH!
- JUST KEEP IT TO YOURSELF, I DON'T WANT TO HEAR IT.
- OKAY, THIS SCHOOL'S NOT NORMAL.
translation.de: OK. Die Schule ist nicht normal.

translation.en: - REALLY?
- YOU'RE NOT NORMAL EITHER.
I'VE SEEN WHAT YOU CAN DO ON STAGE.
translation.de: Ich sah dich auf der Bühne.

translation.en: YOU'RE SPECIAL.
YOU'RE FANTASTIC.
YOU BELONG AT THIS SCHOOL.
NORMAL'S BORING.
- IT'S TRUE. - THAT NORMAL'S BORING?
translation.de: Stimmt. -Dass normal öde ist? -Nein, dass ich alleine war.

translation.en: - NO, THAT NO ONE ASKED ME TO THE PROM.
translation.de: -Dass normal öde ist? -Nein, dass ich alleine war.

translation.en: - YOU KNOW, YOU'RE ACTUALLY NOT TERRIBLE.
YOU'RE REALLY GONNA QUIT HOLLYWOOD ARTS? - WHAT DO YOU THINK I SHOULD DO?
- I THINK YOU SHOULD COME BACK.
- WHY? - SO I WON'T BE KNOWN AT SCHOOL
translation.de: -Du solltest zurückkommen. -Warum? Damit ich nicht die große Schwester von der bin, die am ersten Tag aufgab.

translation.en: AS THE GIRL WITH THE LAME LITTLE SISTER WHO QUIT ON HER FIRST DAY.
translation.de: Damit ich nicht die große Schwester von der bin, die am ersten Tag aufgab.

translation.en: - AND I THINK YOU WERE REALLY GOOD IN THE BIG SHOWCASE.
translation.de: Und dein Auftritt war wirklich gut.

translation.en: - THANKS, TREEN. - BUT I WOULD'VE BEEN AMAZING.
- TORI, YOU'RE BACK. HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT ABOUT COMING IN THROUGH THE WINDOW?
translation.de: Tori. Du bist wieder da. Wolltest du mal durchs Fenster kommen?

translation.en: - NO. - THINK ABOUT IT.
NOW, SIT, SIT.
OKAY, TODAY WE'RE GOING TO DO SOME ALPHABETICAL IMPROV.
translation.de: Ok. Heute machen wir alphabetische Impro.

translation.en: "WHAT IS ALPHABETICAL IMPROV?" YOU ASK.
translation.de: Ok. Heute machen wir alphabetische Impro. "Was ist das?" fragt ihr euch.

translation.en: SO I ANSWER.
IT'S WHEN WE GIVE A LETTER
translation.de: Antwort: Wenn der erste Sprecher einen Buchstaben bekommt.

translation.en: TO THE FIRST ACTOR WHO SPEAKS IN THE SCENE.
translation.de: Wenn der erste Sprecher einen Buchstaben bekommt.

translation.en: IF WE USED THE LETTER "A" AS AN EXAMPLE,
THEN THE ACTOR MUST MAKE HIS FIRST WORD START WITH THE LETTER "A"
translation.de: Das erste Wort muss mit einem "A" anfangen.

translation.en: WHICH MIGHT GO SOMETHING LIKE...
- APPLES ARE FALLING OUT OF MY BUTT.
- LOVELY. NOW, THE NEXT ACTOR WHO SPEAKS MUST START HIS LINE WITH THE NEXT LETTER IN THE ALPHABET,
translation.de: Toll. Der nächste Sprecher beginnt seinen Satz mit dem nächsten Buchstaben.

translation.en: IN THIS CASE, "B," SO HE MIGHT SAY...
- BRING THOSE APPLES, SO THAT WE MAY ALL ENJOY THE FRESH FRUIT FROM BECK'S BUTT.
translation.de: Becks Po macht leckere Früchte, nicht nur Ananas.

translation.en: - CHARMING. NOW, WHO WANTS TO LEAD THE FIRST GROUP?
- I DO. - ALL RIGHT, TORI.
CHOOSE YOUR ACTORS.
ANDRE, CAT, BECK...
AND JADE. YEAH, YOU.
- JADE, KISS YOUR BOYFRIEND ON YOUR OWN TIME.
translation.de: Jade, küss deinen Freund in deiner Freizeit.

translation.en: - OH, I WILL.
- OKAY, IF YOU START YOUR LINE WITH THE WRONG LETTER--
[MAKES BUZZING SOUND] --YOU'RE OUT.
ROBBIE, GIVE US A LETTER.
- OH, I WAS GOING TO SAY "P"!
- OKAY, THE SCENE CAN BE ABOUT ANYTHING YOU WANT.
translation.de: Ok, das Thema der Szene ist egal.

translation.en: THE FIRST LETTER OF THE FIRST LINE IS "P".
TORI, ACTION.
translation.de: Der Satz beginnt mit einem "P". Tori, Action.

translation.en: - PLEASE GO TAKE A SHOWER.
- QUIT TELLING ME WHAT TO DO.
- RELAX GIRLS, LET'S ALL TRY TO GET ALONG.
- TOTALLY. - [MAKES BUZZING SOUND]
CAT, YOUR LINE HAD TO START WITH AN "S". - OH, MY LIFE'S THE WORST!
translation.de: -Cat, das sollte ein "S" sein. -Mein Leben ist grässlich.

translation.en: - HERE'S A PIECE OF CANDY. - YAY, I LOVE CANDY!
- ALL RIGHT, ANDRE, LETTER "S" TO YOU.
- UH, SOMETHIN' JUST BIT MY TOE.
- TURTLE. THAT TURTLE JUST BIT HIS TOE.
- UNBELIEVABLE THAT YOU'RE EVEN HERE.
- VERY IMMATURE OF YOU TO SAY THAT.
translation.de: Viel zu unreif, was du sagst.

translation.en: - UH... - C'MON ANDRE, "W"!
- WHAT IF THE TURTLE BITE BROKE MY TOE-BONE?
translation.de: Wer weiß, ob der Zeh gebrochen ist?

translation.en: - X-RAYS ARE THE ONLY WAY TO FIND OUT.
- YOU SHOULD SHUT UP.
- ZAP! I JUST HEALED YOUR TOE
translation.de: Zack! Ich habe deinen Zeh geheilt.

translation.en: WITH MY MAGIC FINGER. - THANKS!
translation.de: Zack! Ich habe deinen Zeh geheilt. Danke.

translation.en: - [MAKES BUZZING SOUND] ANDRE, YOUR LINE HAD TO START
translation.de: André, das hätte ein "A" sein müssen.

translation.en: WITH AN "A". SIT DOWN.
translation.de: André, das hätte ein "A" sein müssen. Setz dich!

translation.en: - AW, AND I JUST GOT MY TOE-BONE FIXED.
translation.de: Dabei hat er mir den Zeh geheilt.

translation.en: - TORI, LETTER "A" TO YOU.
- ALIENS ARE THE ONLY PEOPLE WHO CAN HEAL TOES BY FINGER-ZAPPING.
- BY THE WAY--
- CORRECT, I AM AN ALIEN.
translation.de: Cool gesehen, ich bin ein Alien.

translation.en: - OH, A TWIST.
- DON'T HURT ME, PLEASE.
- EVEN THOUGH SHE'S EXTREMELY ANNOYING.
- FAINTING, BECAUSE I CAN'T BREATHE YOUR EARTH'S AIR.
translation.de: Falle in Ohnmacht. Kann Erdenluft nicht atmen.

translation.en: - GOSH, IT FAINTED! - EXCELLENT!
TORI AND JADE, KEEP GOING, THE NEXT LETTER'S "H".
- HEY, WHY DON'T YOU GO JUMP OFF THAT CLIFF OVER THERE?
translation.de: Hey, warum springst du nicht in den Tod?

translation.en: - I THINK YOU SHOULD. - JUST WHERE DID YOU COME FROM?
translation.de: -Ich lehne ab. -Ja, wer sind deine Eltern?

translation.en: - KANGAROOS. - LOUSY ANIMALS, KANGAROOS.
translation.de: Kängurus. Lausige Viecher. Tollpatschig und dreckig.

translation.en: THEY'RE AWKWARD AND DIRTY.
- MAYBE THEY LEARNED FROM YOU.
- NO ONE TALKS TO ME LIKE THAT.
- OBVIOUSLY SOMEONE SHOULD.
- PLEASE RUN IN FRONT OF A BUS.
- QUITE OBNOXIOUS OF YOU TO SAY.
- REALLY? - SURE WAS.
- THANKS.
- UP YOUR NOSE, I SEE BOOGERS. - VERY CLEVER.
translation.de: Und du hast da Rotz. -Veilchen? -Willst du...?

translation.en: - WISH YOU'D THOUGHT OF IT?
translation.de: -Veilchen? -Willst du...? X markiert, wo ich dich haue.

translation.en: - "X" MARKS THE SPOT I'D LIKE TO PUNCH.
translation.de: X markiert, wo ich dich haue.

translation.en: - YOUR FINGER SMELLS WEIRD.
- ZERO IS WHAT YOU ARE ON A SCALE FROM ONE TO 10.
translation.de: Zeitlebens bist du eine 10 von 10 in Ekel.

translation.en: - AND BACK TO THE LETTER "A"!
- AS IF I CARE WHAT YOU THINK. - BETTER WATCH YOURSELF.
- CAN'T TAKE IT? - DON'T PUSH ME.
- EAT YOUR PANTS!
- YOU EAT YOUR PANTS! WAIT!
[MAKES BUZZING SOUND] - SORRY JADE, THE NEXT LETTER WAS--
- "F"! I KNOW!
- KEEP THE SCENE GOING. LETTER "G"!
- GET UP, ALIEN.
- HEAD-- FEELS DIZZY.
- I KNOW WHAT'LL MAKE YOU FEEL BETTER.
- JUMPING JACKS?
- KISS ME.
- LET'S DO IT.
- MAN, I LOVE THIS SCHOOL.
- THESLAP.COM - THE SLAP?
- IT'S THE WEB SITE WHERE YOU CAN FIND OUT ABOUT EVERYONE HERE IN HOLLYWOOD ARTS HIGH SCHOOL.
translation.de: Dort steht alles über jeden auf der Hollywood Arts.

translation.en: - OH, YOU MEAN THESLAP.COM? - IT'S A SLAP.
translation.de: Oh, du meinst TheSlap.com. -Na, TheSlap. -Das ultimative Online-Erlebnis.

translation.en: - THE ULTIMATE ONLINE EXPERIENCE.
- THERE'S GAMES... - THINGS TO CLICK ON...
- MUSIC... - PICS AND VIDEOS...
- VIDEOS THAT MIGHT GET CERTAIN PEOPLE IN TROUBLE...
translation.de: Videos, die etwas peinlich für manche sind.

translation.en: - LOBSTERS FREAK ME OUT.
- YOU'RE A DEMON!
